data.title: Saba Software Acquires THINQ Learning Solutions
data.meta_description: On May 25, 2005, Saba Software acquired software company THINQ Learning Solutions
data.text:
HumanConcepts

Sausalito, California, United States

HumanConcepts enables enterprises to better manage organizational change of all types, including growth, rightsizing and reorganization. Using solutions from HumanConcepts, customers can achieve organization agility, more easily understand how they are organized, plan for the future, and transition the workforce to its optimal state.
